Workflow.Name: Firefox AgentNewHire.2
Workflow.Inputs: {"schema":{"required":["Space","Comma","ForwardSlash","Salesforce_New_User","OneLogin_New_User","AgentHierarchy_New_User","AgentHierarchy","Copy"],"properties":{"Space":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"Just a space, used to separate first and lame name in agent full name","format":null,"title":"Space","type":"string","value":" "},"Comma":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"Comma","format":null,"title":"Comma","type":"string","value":","},"ForwardSlash":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"ForwardSlash","format":null,"title":"ForwardSlash","type":"string","value":"/"},"Salesforce_New_User":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"Salesforce_New_User webpage\r\n","format":null,"title":"Salesforce_New_User","type":"string","value":"https://aaalife.my.salesforce.com/005/e?retURL=%2F005%3FisUserEntityOverride%3D1%26retURL%3D%252Fui%252Fsetup%252FSetup%253Fsetupid%253DUsers%26setupid%3DManageUsers&isUserEntityOverride=1"},"OneLogin_New_User":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"OneLogin_New_User","format":null,"title":"OneLogin_New_User","type":"string","value":"https://aaalife.onelogin.com/users/new"},"AgentHierarchy_New_User":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"AgentHierarchy_New_User","format":null,"title":"AgentHierarchy_New_User","type":"string","value":"https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/add"},"AgentHierarchy":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"AgentHierarchy","format":null,"title":"AgentHierarchy","type":"string","value":"https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/"},"Copy":{"isOptional":false,"default":"","description":"","format":null,"title":"NewInput","type":"string","value":"{Crtl}+c"}},"type":"object"}}
Workflow.Definition:
"@@ConnectionString: ''
@@Type: 'Local'
@@DesktopType: 'local'
@@DisplayName: 'Local computer'
IMPORT 'controlRepo.appmask' AS appmask
IMPORT 'imageRepo.imgrepo' AS imgrepo
@SENSITIVE: []
@INPUT Space : { 'Description': 'Just a space, used to separate first and lame name in agent full name', 'FriendlyName': 'Space', 'DefaultValue': ' ', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT Comma : { 'Description': 'Comma', 'FriendlyName': 'Comma', 'DefaultValue': ',', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT ForwardSlash : { 'Description': 'ForwardSlash', 'FriendlyName': 'ForwardSlash', 'DefaultValue': '/', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT Salesforce_New_User : { 'Description': '''Salesforce_New_User webpage
''', 'FriendlyName': 'Salesforce_New_User', 'DefaultValue': 'https://aaalife.my.salesforce.com/005/e?retURL=%2F005%3FisUserEntityOverride%3D1%26retURL%3D%252Fui%252Fsetup%252FSetup%253Fsetupid%253DUsers%26setupid%3DManageUsers&isUserEntityOverride=1', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT OneLogin_New_User : { 'Description': 'OneLogin_New_User', 'FriendlyName': 'OneLogin_New_User', 'DefaultValue': 'https://aaalife.onelogin.com/users/new', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT AgentHierarchy_New_User : { 'Description': 'AgentHierarchy_New_User', 'FriendlyName': 'AgentHierarchy_New_User', 'DefaultValue': 'https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/add', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT AgentHierarchy : { 'Description': 'AgentHierarchy', 'FriendlyName': 'AgentHierarchy', 'Type': 'String', 'IsOptional': False, 'DefaultValue': 'https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/' } 
@INPUT Copy : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'NewInput', 'Type': 'String', 'IsOptional': False, 'DefaultValue': '{Crtl}+c' } 
/# Agent New Hire Automation

Prerequsite:
-Already logged into ServiceNow(Next Experience Turned Off) in Firefox
-Open webpage with ticket with Firefox
-Already logged into Onelogin/Salesforce/Agent Hierarchy in Firefox

Possible Issues:
-User inputs data incorrectly(different data formats), so the data is read wrong or missed
-Used for Agents, can use for Managers, but doublecheck fields(AMS level)
-Missing NPN(check line 42, end flag) / Missing LicenseNumber(Check line 44, flag)
Some use:
"Agent License Number/State-"
Others
"Agent License Number/State/LOA-", etc

Known Issues:
SF
-Flow doesn't search manager id
-Role isn't selected
OL
AH
-Club code isn't selected
-Manager isn't selected

Latest test with CAR0034398#/
/# Click on "User Information" to ensure data is displayed
#/
UIAutomation.Click.Click Element: appmask['Window \'CAR0036047 | ... â€” Mozilla Firefox\'']['Tab Item \'User Information\''] ClickType: UIAutomation.ClickType.LeftClick MousePositionRelativeToElement: UIAutomation.RectangleEdgePoint.MiddleCenter OffsetX: 0 OffsetY: 0
# Grabs all the New Hire Information as variables
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Control}({C})''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: True
Clipboard.GetText Text=> AgentFirstName
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Control}({C})''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: True

MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Control}({C})''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: True

MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Control}({C})''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: True
Clipboard.GetText Text=> AgentCityTrimmed

MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Control}({C})''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: True

MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Control}({C})''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: True

Clipboard.GetText Text=> CompanyCode1

UIAutomation.GetElementDetails Element: appmask['Window \'CAR0036401 | ... â€” Mozilla Firefox\'']['List 3'] AttributeName: $'''Own Text''' BringToFront: True AttributeValue=> CompanyCode1
Text.CropText.CropTextBeforeFlag Text: CompanyCode1 ToFlag: Space IgnoreCase: False CroppedText=> CompanyCode IsFlagFound=> IsFlagFound

# CREATE USER FOR SALESFORCE
WebAutomation.LaunchFirefox.LaunchFirefox Url: Salesforce_New_User WindowState: WebAutomation.BrowserWindowState.Maximized ClearCache: False ClearCookies: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 Timeout: 60 PiPUserDataFolderMode: WebAutomation.PiPUserDataFolderModeEnum.AutomaticProfile BrowserInstance=> Firefox1
WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextFieldUsePhysicalKeyboard BrowserInstance: Firefox1 Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... Override=1\'']['Input text \'name_firstName\''] Text: AgentFirstName Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace UnfocusAfterPopulate: True WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextFieldUsePhysicalKeyboard BrowserInstance: Firefox1 Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... Override=1\'']['Input text \'name_lastName\''] Text: AgentLastName Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace UnfocusAfterPopulate: True WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60

Override=1\'']['Input text \'Username\''] Text: $'''%AgentEmailTrimmed%.apt''' Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace UnfocusAfterPopulate: True WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60

Override=1\'']['Input text \'CompanyName\''] Text: InsuranceCompanyNameTrimmed Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace UnfocusAfterPopulate: True WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
# ADD ROLE LOGIC FOR SALESFORCE
WebAutomation.SetDropDownListValue.SetDropDownListValueByIndex BrowserInstance: Firefox1 Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... Override=1\'']['Select \'Salesforce Integration\''] OptionsIndeces: 4 WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.SetDropDownListValue.SetDropDownListValueByIndex BrowserInstance: Firefox1 Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... Override=1\'']['Select \'AgentScreenPop_Chatter\''] OptionsIndeces: 2 WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60

Override=1\'']['Input text \'00NPs00000Ksd0r\' 2'] Text: AgentNumber Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace UnfocusAfterPopulate: True WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60

 WebAutomation.SetCheckboxState.SetCheckboxState BrowserInstance: Firefox1 Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... Override=1\'']['Input checkbox \'00NC0000006WS26\''] State: WebAutomation.CheckboxState.Checked WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
END
IF AgentTypeTrimmed = $'''EA''' THEN
 WebAutomation.SetCheckboxState.SetCheckboxState BrowserInstance: Firefox1 Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... Override=1\'']['Input checkbox \'00NC0000006WS26\''] State: WebAutomation.CheckboxState.Checked WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
END

# CREATE USER FOR AGENT HIERARCHY
WebAutomation.CreateNewTab.CreateNewTab BrowserInstance: Firefox1 Url: AgentHierarchy WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 NewBrowserInstance=> Firefox3
WebAutomation.Click.Click BrowserInstance: Firefox3 Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/\'']['Button \'Add New\''] ClickType: WebAutomation.ClickType.LeftClick MouseClick: True WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 MousePositionRelativeToElement: WebAutomation.RectangleEdgePoint.MiddleCenter OffsetX: 0 OffsetY: 0
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
/# FIX COMPANY
#/
IF FastCode = $'''ACA''' THEN
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''ACA''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Return}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
END
IF FastCode = $'''ACE''' THEN
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''ACE''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Return}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
END

 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''ACG''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False

 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''IND-ALAN''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False

 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''IND-NY''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Return}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
END
IF FastCode = $'''MWG''' THEN
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''MWG''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Return}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
END
IF FastCode = $'''NE''' THEN
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''NE''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Return}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
END
IF FastCode = $'''NE-NY''' THEN
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''NE-NY''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Return}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
END
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: AgentFirstName DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: AgentLastName DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Down}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Return}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: AgentNumber DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Tab}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
IF AgentTypeTrimmed = $'''EA''' THEN
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Down}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Down}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Return}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
ELSE IF AgentTypeTrimmed = $'''IA''' THEN
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Down}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Down}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Down}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Down}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False

ELSE IF AgentTypeTrimmed = $'''LS''' THEN
 MouseAndKeyboard.SendKeys.FocusAndSendKeys TextToSend: $'''{Down}''' DelayBetweenKeystrokes: 10 SendTextAsHardwareKeys: False

# FIX CLUB CODE
"

Workflow.Name: AgentTermination
Workflow.Definition:
"@@ConnectionString: ''
@@Type: 'Local'
@@DesktopType: 'local'
@@DisplayName: 'Local computer'
IMPORT 'controlRepo.appmask' AS appmask
IMPORT 'imageRepo.imgrepo' AS imgrepo
@SENSITIVE: []
@INPUT AgentHierarchy : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'AgentHierarchy', 'DefaultValue': 'https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT OneLogin : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'OneLogin_Users', 'DefaultValue': 'https://aaalife.onelogin.com/users/', 'Type': 'String' } 
@INPUT Salesforce : { 'Description': '', 'FriendlyName': 'Salesforce', 'DefaultValue': 'https://aaalife.my.salesforce.com/ui/setup/Setup', 'Type': 'String' } 
/# Agent Termination Automation

Prerequisites:
PowerAutomate Web Extension
Logged into OneLogin
Logged into AgentOne
#/
UIAutomation.GetWindowDetails Window: appmask['Window \'CAR0031963 | ... - Microsoftâ€‹ Edge\'']['Edit \'First Name\''] ExtractionOperation: UIAutomation.WindowProperties.Text BringToFront: True Property=> FirstName
UIAutomation.GetWindowDetails Window: appmask['Window \'CAR0031963 | ... - Microsoftâ€‹ Edge\'']['Edit \'Last Name\''] ExtractionOperation: UIAutomation.WindowProperties.Text BringToFront: True Property=> LastName
UIAutomation.GetWindowDetails Window: appmask['Window \'CAR0031963 | ... - Microsoftâ€‹ Edge\'']['Edit \'Agent Number\''] ExtractionOperation: UIAutomation.WindowProperties.Text BringToFront: True Property=> AgentNumber
/# REMOVE ONELOGIN
--------------------------------
Re-enable steps 7-13
#/
WebAutomation.LaunchEdge.LaunchEdge Url: OneLogin WindowState: WebAutomation.BrowserWindowState.Maximized ClearCache: False ClearCookies: False WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 Timeout: 60 BrowserInstance=> Browser
WebAutomation.Focus.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://aaalife.onelogin.com/users\'']['Input text \'name\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://aaalife.onelogin.com/users\'']['Input text \'name\''] Text: $'''%FirstName% %LastName%''' Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
DISABLE WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... eg+Marzion\'']['Table data cell \'Inactive\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
DISABLE WebAutomation.SelectRadioButton.SelectRadioButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... 59880/edit\'']['Inserted text'] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
DISABLE WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... 59880/edit\'']['Input submit \'Save User\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
DISABLE WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... 59880/edit\'']['Anchor \'Unlicense\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
DISABLE WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser Control: appmask['Web Page \'h ... 59880/edit\'']['Div \'CONTINUE\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.CreateNewTab.CreateNewTab BrowserInstance: Browser Url: Salesforce WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 NewBrowserInstance=> Browser2
WebAutomation.Focus.Focus BrowserInstance: Browser2 Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://aaalife.my.salesforce.com/ui/setup/Setup\'']['Input text \'Search...\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser2 Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://aaalife.my.salesforce.com/ui/setup/Setup\'']['Input text \'Search...\''] Text: $'''%FirstName% %LastName%''' Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace EmulateTyping: False UnfocusAfterPopulate: True WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser2 Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://aaalife.my.salesforce.com/ui/setup/Setup\'']['Input button \'Search\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
/# Find correct user entry
#/
WebAutomation.CreateNewTab.CreateNewTab BrowserInstance: Browser2 Url: AgentHierarchy WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60 NewBrowserInstance=> Browser3
WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser3 Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/\'']['Input text'] Text: FirstName Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser3 Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/\'']['Input text 2'] Text: LastName Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.PopulateTextField.PopulateTextField BrowserInstance: Browser3 Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/\'']['Input text 3'] Text: AgentNumber Mode: WebAutomation.PopulateTextMode.Replace EmulateTyping: True UnfocusAfterPopulate: True WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser3 Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/\'']['Button \'Search\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser3 Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/\'']['Paragraph \'Edit\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser3 Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/add\'']['Span \'Active\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser3 Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/add\'']['Div \'Inactive\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
WebAutomation.PressButton.PressButton BrowserInstance: Browser3 Control: appmask['Web Page \'https://agent-hierarchy.aaalife.com/add\'']['Button \'Save\''] WaitForPageToLoadTimeout: 60
"
